data.title: RGPxScientist — One-Page Brief (forwardable)
data.summary: A forwardable one-page entry point for scientists: RGPxScientist is retrieval-first and audit-ready, turning research questions into explicit definitions, invariant candidates, a falsifiability protocol, and minimal next checks. The RGPx lens is stated operationally as: “What stays invariant when surface details change?” — turning robustness into a testable workflow.
